meanings.sent1: After running a marathon, I felt completely buggered.
meanings.sent2: The old car was buggered and needed a lot of repairs.
meanings.sent3: I tried to finish my homework, but my buggered brain couldn't focus.
meanings.sent4: His buggered legs refused to carry him any further.
meanings.sent5: The buggered engine sputtered and died on the side of the road.

meanings.sent1: The buggered vase lay shattered on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The storm buggered the roof of the house, causing leaks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my buggered phone in the toilet.
meanings.sent4: The buggered bridge collapsed under the weight of the truck.
meanings.sent5: The buggered toy was beyond repair, missing pieces and all.

meanings.definition: Used as an expletive or curse word
meanings.sent1: Buggered! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent2: Buggered if I know how to fix this mess!
meanings.sent3: Buggered me sideways, I can't believe I did that.
meanings.sent4: Well, buggered be if that isn't the strangest thing I've seen.
meanings.sent5: Buggered all, why does everything have to go wrong today?
